title.abbrev: NewReno Modification to TCP's Fast Recovery

front.title: The NewReno Modification to TCP's Fast Recovery Algorithm

author.organization: AT&T Center for Internet Research at ICSI (ACIRI)

abstract.t: documents the following four intertwined TCP congestion control algorithms: Slow Start, Congestion Avoidance, Fast Retransmit, and Fast Recovery.explicitly allows certain modifications of these algorithms, including modifications that use theTCP Selective Acknowledgement (SACK) optionand modifications that respond to "partial acknowledgments" (ACKs which cover new data, but not all the data outstanding when loss was detected) in the absence of SACK. This document describes a specific algorithm for responding to partial acknowledgments, referred to as NewReno. This response to partial acknowledgments was first proposed by Janey Hoe in.
